moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Feint
moves.description: An attack that hits a target using Protect or Detect. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

moves.name: Power-Up Punch
moves.description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

moves.name: Swords Dance
moves.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Bone Rush
moves.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

moves.name: Calm Mind
moves.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Heal Pulse
moves.description: The user emits a healing pulse which restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.
